14 namespace zserio
15 {
16  static const int HASH_PRIME_NUMBER = 37;
17  static const int HASH_SEED = 23;
26  inline int calcHashCodeFirstTerm(int seedValue)
27  {
28  return HASH_PRIME_NUMBER * seedValue;
29  }
30 
39  inline int calcHashCode(int seedValue, bool value)
40  {
41  return calcHashCodeFirstTerm(seedValue) + (value ? 1 : 0);
42  }
43 
52  inline int calcHashCode(int seedValue, uint8_t value)
53  {
54  return calcHashCodeFirstTerm(seedValue) + static_cast<int>(value);
55  }
56 
65  inline int calcHashCode(int seedValue, uint16_t value)
66  {
67  return calcHashCodeFirstTerm(seedValue) + static_cast<int>(value);
68  }
69 
78  inline int calcHashCode(int seedValue, uint32_t value)
79  {
80  return calcHashCodeFirstTerm(seedValue) + static_cast<int>(value);
81  }
82 
91  inline int calcHashCode(int seedValue, uint64_t value)
92  {
93  return calcHashCodeFirstTerm(seedValue) + static_cast<int>(value ^ (value >> 32));
94  }
95 
104  inline int calcHashCode(int seedValue, int8_t value)
105  {
106  return calcHashCodeFirstTerm(seedValue) + static_cast<int>(value);
107  }
108 
117  inline int calcHashCode(int seedValue, int16_t value)
118  {
119  return calcHashCodeFirstTerm(seedValue) + static_cast<int>(value);
120  }
121 
130  inline int calcHashCode(int seedValue, int32_t value)
131  {
132  return calcHashCodeFirstTerm(seedValue) + value;
133  }
134 
143  inline int calcHashCode(int seedValue, int64_t value)
144  {
145  return calcHashCode(seedValue, static_cast<uint64_t>(value));
146  }
147 
156  inline int calcHashCode(int seedValue, float value)
157  {
158  return calcHashCode(seedValue, convertFloatToUInt32(value));
159  }
160 
169  inline int calcHashCode(int seedValue, double value)
170  {
171  return calcHashCode(seedValue, convertDoubleToUInt64(value));
172  }
173 
182  inline int calcHashCode(int seedValue, const std::string& stringValue)
183  {
184  int result = seedValue;
185  for (std::string::value_type element : stringValue)
186  result = calcHashCode(result, element);
187 
188  return result;
189  }
190 
199  template <typename ENUM_TYPE>
200  inline typename std::enable_if<std::is_enum<ENUM_TYPE>::value, int>::type calcHashCode(int seedValue,
201  ENUM_TYPE enumValue)
202  {
203  return calcHashCode(seedValue, enumToValue(enumValue));
204  }
205 
214  template <typename OBJECT>
215  inline typename std::enable_if<!std::is_enum<OBJECT>::value, int>::type calcHashCode(int seedValue,
216  const OBJECT& object)
217  {
218  return calcHashCode(seedValue, object.hashCode());
219  }
220 
229  template <typename ARRAY_ELEMENT>
230  inline int calcHashCode(int seedValue, const std::vector<ARRAY_ELEMENT>& array)
231  {
232  int result = seedValue;
233  for (const ARRAY_ELEMENT& element : array)
234  result = calcHashCode(result, element);
235 
236  return result;
237  }
238 
239  // must be last because of the two-phase lookup
240  // - we can have optional array (OptionaHolder<std::vector<T>>), but we cannot have array of optionals
249  template <typename FIELD>
250  inline int calcHashCode(int seedValue, const OptionalHolder<FIELD>& optionalHolder)
251  {
252  if (!optionalHolder)
253  return calcHashCode(seedValue, 0);
254 
255  return calcHashCode(seedValue, *optionalHolder);
256  }
257 } // namespace zserio
